TTY Toolkit

Summary

A collection of libraries to make command line apps better with Ruby

Jots

Comparable to Rich, but presented as distinct components rather than a full framework.

Components I’ve used

tty-command

straightforward interface to launching executables and capturing output

tty-editor

launch $EDITOR

tty-file

file handling utilities

tty-logger

much improved debug logging

tty-prompt

interactive user prompts

tty-table

pretty print tables

tty-tree

pretty print data trees

Related

TTY • The Ruby terminal apps toolkit
